title: Lesson 1
content: I wake up at 7 AM every day. I drink coffee and eat breakfast with my sister. Then, I walk to the park. It is a sunny day and I feel very happy.

title: Lesson 2
content: Tom lives in a small red house. It has a big garden with blue flowers. He likes to sit outside and read books. His cat sleeps on the green grass.

title: Lesson 3
content: Last weekend, I traveled to the city by train. The station was very crowded, but I found a seat near the window. I saw many tall buildings and bright lights.

title: Lesson 4
content: Many people now work from home using their computers. It is quiet and comfortable, but sometimes I miss my colleagues. We have video meetings every morning.

title: Lesson 5
content: Rapid advancements in AI are reshaping our society. While automation increases efficiency, it also raises ethical concerns regarding privacy. We must balance innovation with human values.

title: Lesson 6
content: Global temperatures are rising due to increased carbon emissions. Sustainable living is no longer a choice but a necessity. Every small action contributes to the preservation of our planet.
